title: Digital Photography
description: Learn the fundamentals of digital photography, including camera settings, composition techniques, and basic editing. Suitable for beginners. Limited to 15 students.

title: Portrait Photography Masterclass
description: Discover the art of capturing captivating portraits. From lighting setups to posing techniques, this course will help you master the art of portrait photography. Limited to 20 students.

title: Landscape Photography Workshop
description: Explore the beauty of landscapes through your camera lens. Learn about composition, exposure, and post-processing techniques to capture stunning outdoor images. Limited to 12 students.

title: Street Photography Intensive
description: Immerse yourself in the world of street photography. Develop your observational skills, learn to anticipate moments, and tell compelling visual stories. Limited to 18 students.

title: Fashion Photography Masterclass
description: Dive into the glamorous world of fashion photography. From editorial shoots to runway coverage, learn the techniques to capture stunning fashion images. Limited to 25 students.

title: Product Photography Workshop
description: Master the art of product photography. Learn lighting setups, composition techniques, and post-processing skills to showcase products in their best light. Limited to 10 students.

title: Wildlife Photography Expedition
description: Embark on thrilling field trips to capture the beauty of wildlife in their natural habitats. Learn techniques for wildlife photography and storytelling through images. Limited to 16 students.

title: Black and White Photography Workshop
description: Discover the timeless elegance of black and white photography. Learn to see the world in shades of gray and master the art of monochrome compositions. Limited to 15 students.

title: Wedding Photography Masterclass
description: Capture the magic of weddings through your lens. From essential equipment to posing techniques, learn the skills needed to excel as a wedding photographer. Limited to 20 students.

title: Experimental Photography Workshop
description: Push the boundaries of traditional photography and explore experimental techniques. Learn to create unique and imaginative images through various unconventional methods. Limited to 12 students.
